snippet.title: Crusader Kings II: Sunset Invasion Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now: http://www.crusaderkings.com/buy
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Crusaderkings
Twitter: http://twitter.com/Crusaderkings
Forum: http://forum.paradoxplaza.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?551-Crusader-Kings-II

Crusader Kings II: Sunset Invasion Released Today! 
Witness Human Sacrifice via Live Stream at 7pm GMT / 11am PST 

NEW YORK -- November 15, 2012 -- A dark cloud looms over Western Europe and peculiar ships appear on the horizon as Paradox Interactive have today released Crusader Kings II: Sunset Invasion, the latest DLC for critically-acclaimed strategy RPG Crusader Kings II and first fantasy scenario ever introduced to a Paradox Interactive strategy game. 

Featuring a treasure trove of new features that would make Montezuma himself jealous, Crusader Kings II: Sunset Invasion pits the European dynasties against the brutal conquering force of the ferocious Aztec civilization and they aren't here to trade chocolate! 

Descending on the shores of Europe like a plague, the bloodthirsty foes bring with them exotic and deadly disease as well as a craving to massacre everyone in their path. Endurance will be stretched to the limit in order to evade being captured and having your innards dished up as a sacrifice to their greedy and vindictive gods. 

Are you ready for the biggest threat Europe could have known? 

Join Henrik Fåhraeus, Game Designer and Project Lead from Paradox Development Studios, today at 7pm GMT / 11am PST for a live stream presentation at the official Paradox channel on Twitch TV: http://www.twitch.tv/paradoxinteractive

Crusader Kings II: Sunset Invasion is now available from major digital download portals for $4.99USD. For more information, visit the official Crusader Kings II site: http://www.crusaderkings.com/buy
